alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SCHUYLKILL COUNTY THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Clair, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McKeansburg and Tuscarora around 125 AM EDT. Tamaqua and Hometown around 135 AM EDT. Snyders around 145 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ravine, Mary-D, Auburn, Deer Lake and Middleport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
